Text: FW California Employee Cc ANy comment Original Message From Staffan Akerstrom mailto Sent Wednesday December PM To Questions Cc Michael Yamrach Subject California Employee I was an employee based in California It is my understanding that according to California law I am an employee until I have been paid in full what the company owes me including accrued vacation and expenses Will I be paid for ther month of December Staffan Akerstrom

FW Question on Employement ContractWant me to reply in any fashion Tim Original Message From Juan Hernandez mailto Sent Sunday December PM To Questions Subject Question on Employement Contract Why do lawyers at Enron not return calls from exEnron employees I would just like a clarification on an employement contract that ended a year ago Unfortunately it has a clause stating a noncompete of days from when I resign from Enron My supposed contact is Michelle Cash Thank you in advance for your response
